thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 9 of 672
thread.title: Tanya

author: Tanya
title: Tanya
text: I received my frames in less than a week and were even nicer than they looked great, so I placed orders for 2 more pairs. I spent a small fortune on the glasses because I had such an amazing experience the first time. I received 6 emails asking to verify the small amount charged to my card for security purposes, then my order would be released. I complied each and every time, the repeated phone calls at my work were answered with the same request for the same amount. I gave the amount expecting my order. I still have not gotten my glasses, I have a reprimand at work for the repeated phone calls and as I was writing this review I received yet another e mail asking for me to verify the stinking $ 2.33 charge! I'm starting to think I am being scammed! Please, just send me my orders already, it has been 2 weeks .
